fields.headline: How England rated
fields.bodyText: Iain Balshaw Given the time to look good again 7/10 Josh Lewsey The big hits and the quick wits 7/10 Will Greenwood The brain that made the midfield work 9/10 Jason Robinson Three tries and man-of-the-match. Made it look easy 9/10 Ben Cohen Desperate to get on the score sheet 6/10 Paul Grayson Followed the script perfectly 8/10 Andy Gomarsall Gave Grayson time to follow the script 6/10 Trevor Woodman A hard afternoon against abrasive Castrogiovanni 6/10 Steve Thompson The lineout radar is back in full working order 7/10 Phil Vickery 70 minutes of solid effort and endeavour 7/10 Danny Grewcock The enforcer kept his cool admirably 6/10 Ben Kay Did the basics well and then some 7/10 Joe Worsley Woodward's midfield battering ram 6/10 Richard Hill Head down for most of the afternoon 7/10 Lawrence Dallaglio Too busy leading the side to showboat 8/10 Replacements Henry Paul Too late to make an impact Matt Dawson A cool, old head Olly Barkley Looked to get involved Mark Regan A useful standby Jason Leonard Still a great presence Simon Shaw Showed his mobility Chris Jones Dream debut with a try
